text: While I was debugging the merge of modular-locals into 2.0, there was a call to nodes.const_factory in const_infer_binary_op, which didn't exist any more.  I'm not sure where, but there was an except: clause catching the AttributeError inappropriately at some point during the inference, which made it very hard to debug.
title: Narrow exception handling for AttributeErrors in the inference to avoid concealing bugs
Narrow exception handling for AttributeErrors in the inference to avoid concealing bugs
